div.div: Adaptation pathways and yield change from the current level in the timely case of all the climate projections in Germany (GER), India (IND), and Pakistan (PAK) under the RCP8.5 scenario.
div.p: The descriptions “run1”, “run2”, and “run3” correspond to r1i1p1, r2i1p1, and r3i1p1 of the CMIP5 simulations, respectively.
